game.name: The Last Phoenix
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 앱 내 구매, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The Last Phoenix is a platformer RPG where death only makes you stronger! Felix a goblin who possesses a demonic power of reincarnation must save his kind from eradication!
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Last Phoenix is a platformer RPG where death only makes you stronger! Felix a goblin who possesses a demonic power of reincarnation must save his kind from eradication!
